item.description:
This 5K and 10K race event takes place on a gently rolling course (map) on the grounds of Bradley International Airport in Windsor Locks, Connecticut. The race is certified USATF/RRTC #CT-04002-PH. Prizes awarded in multiple age classes and t-shirts are awarded to the first 200 entrants. Come and enjoy the newly paved course

____________________________________________________________________________

http://www.bradleyroa...

____________________________________________________________________________

We will all meet at 8:00 AM (I will let you know where).

Registration for the day of the race is from 7:15 am â€“ 8:15 am. The races start at 8:30.

For anyone who wants to carpool: There is the huge parking lot at Target, 475 Hartford Road, New Britain, CT 06053. Take exit 39A off Route 9 South. We can meet there (email me).
item.name: 15th Annual Bradley International Road Race
